amaradewa / latha walpolanalu niliyan - toni ranasinha, suwinitha kongahage, jo abewikrama, agra sajiwani, hiyugo pranandu, don sirisena, latishiya piris, senaka perera, wijaya kumaranathunga, aananda wikramage, wijaya koraya, nilanthi wijesinha, edi jayamanna, rukmani dewi, somasiri dehipitiya, bandula udaya kumaraarambhaka sinama shala - krawun – maradana, manel - dematagoda, roksi - wallawaththa, kuwinlan – nugegoda, raj – migamuwa, oodiyan – mahanuwara, chaya - kagalla, niw sinama - kurunagala, jiwani – alawwa, parl - halawatha, chandra - awissawella, chithra - kaluthara, kwins - galla, pablik hol - gampahasumithurothiragatha wu dinaya – 1983 pebarawari 12 idiripath kirima - jothi films nishpadanaya (sama) – ech. aar. jothipala – pi. em. jinadasa adhyakshanaya - royi da silwa kathawa, debas, thira natakaya – padmasiri kodikara sahaya adhyakshanaya – prabhath kumara, ranjith siriwardhana kamara adhyakshanaya – em. ee. gafur sanskaranaya - am. ee. rupasena / siri ke.

mewana wita samanya nithiya yatathe rate paripalanaya gena yamata haki pasubima udawi athi bawath,ee pilibanda thaman sahimata pathwana bawin hadisi nithiya iwath kirime yojanawa parlimenthuwata idiripath karana bawath janadhipathiwaraya penwadunneya. 2005 wasarata prathama hadisi nithiya yatathe me rate puwathpath thahanam kerunu bawath,madhya waranayak kriyathmaka wu bawath sihipath kala janadhipathiwaraya thama rajaya yatathe kisi witekath hadisi nithiya yatathe puwathpath waranayak sidunokala bawa sandahan kaleya. 2006 wasare juni masaye sita 2009 wasare mayi masaya thek rate thrasthawadaya thuran karannata hadisi nithiya prayojanawath wu bawath,ethan sita jana jiwithaya samanya thaththwaya pathkirimatath,sahana kandawuru thula janaya punaruththapanaya karannatath,yali padinchi kirim aadiya sidukarannatath hadisi nithiya yoda gannata siduwu bawa janadhipathiwaraya awadharanaya kaleya.
